commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Aren't these waffles tasty? And with this vanilla ice cream on top... Mmm! I can't get enough of it!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yeah...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Rin, I understand how anxiously you must be awaiting their reply, but all we can do is wait for now.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, there it is!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That was pretty fast.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Looks like it's the manager's wife replying. "Thank you for always visiting our restaurant." They remember me! And they told me why they're closed, too!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Really? So, what's the reason?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Um, she says that their part-timers had to keep taking days off or quit due to illness or personal circumstances, so now they don't have enough people to run the place.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But the owner decided to try and run the place on his own, wound up pushing himself too hard, and got himself sick.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So now the only person who can work is his wife. She's probably really busy nursing him back to health, though. It's no wonder they had to close.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: This must be really hard for them both. Is there anything I can do to help? Or am I really just stuck waiting for things to get better for them?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey, why don't we go give them a hand?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What do you mean?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! The only reason they can't open shop is because they're short-handed, right? In that case, we can step in and take over for the people who aren't there!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh... Yeah, that would work! That way we could help everyone at the restaurant!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Rin, try contacting them once more. Please ask them if we can assist at their restaurant.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Right!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: She just got back to me!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What did she say?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: She said they'd love for us to help out! And that it would really help if we could fill in until everyone got back on their feet!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But she also says it's hard to be open every day because she has to also take care of her husband.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: For now, they're at least going to open tomorrow, Saturday, and Sunday during lunchtime if we could come help. I think she's gonna let us practice cooking their menu!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Then it's decided! Let's all go save Rin's favorite restaurant!

commands.speaker: Ayumu, Rina, Rin, Kanan, Dia
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Do you remember what ingredients the ramen shop lady told us to get?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Bean sprouts, shrimp, garlic, wood ear mushrooms, dried shiitake mushrooms, hawk claw peppers... Oh, and both bread and wheat flour. That's a lot of stuff!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hawk claw peppers? Is that something we can get at a standard Japanese supermarket?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Rina, hawk claw peppers are just another name for red chili peppers. They're called hawk claw peppers because of their shape.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I see... You're a real expert, Rin!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Giggle* The owner of the restaurant we're about to save told me about it before.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey guys, we're definitely gonna need these, so I'm just gonna slip these in the cart if ya don't mind.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Why would a Chinese restaurant need all that junk food?! Go put that back!
